collection-school-wide-covid19-updates

div.p: PCS will be closed until April 22nd, 2020. As you know we continue to closely monitor the outbreak of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) both locally and globally. Please check out the links listed to see the continual updates from our Head of School. Make sure you are checking your emails for important updates and information as well, these will typically be seen as attachments. If you have not been receiving emails please contact us at office@premiercharterschool.org with your name, your child(ren)’s name, and updated email address. Please know that we are doing our very best to make decisions in the best interest of our students and families through this time.

We would also like to remind you that every Tuesday you will receive your weekly schoolwide update and we will continue to keep you informed as plans evolve. In order to develop an effective At Home Learning Plan while we are closed, we are asking all families to please complete the following survey. https://forms.gle/Q6nBmr3tUpHLe8yj9

Thanks and Stay Healthy,
Your PCS Family

div.a: Helping Children Cope with a Disaster (3.22.20)
